maqras.text: gipilko chaj-aol nal
gipilko chaj-aol nal-ilan mueos-inga
mueos-i geudaeege gipilko chaj-aol nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
ssamudeu bujoggwa adeu bujog-eun daejaeang-ui nal-eul bujeonghayeossnola
ssamudeu bujog-i geughan-ui gotong-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossdamyeon
adeu bujog-eun hoghan-ui sanaun balam-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossnola

geubunkkeseo geugeos(balam)eul guljongsikisim-e (balam-eun) ilgob bamgwa yeodeolb naj dong-an geudeul-eul deopchigo hulyeossnola. geulihayeo geu ttae geudaeneun muliga gokkulajyeo iss-eum-eul boni geudeul-eun machi sseuleojyeo beolin yajasuui momtong-gwado gatdeola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul jung-e nam-a issneun eotteon geos-ilado bol su issneunga
palaowa geu ijeon-ui jadeulgwa dwijibhyeojin ma-eul(jumindeul)eun joeleul gajigo wassnola
geuleohge geudeul-eun geudeul junim-ui sado-e bulboghayeoss-euni geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-eul gyeoglyeolhi pamyeolsikisyeossnola
sillo naneun mul-i gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseoss-eul ttae geudaedeul-eul bangjue taewossnola
geulihayeo naega geugeos-eul geudaedeul-eul wihan tteoollim-eulo dugo, myeongsimhaneun gwiga geugeos-eul myeongsimhagi wiham-ila
ije napal-e sum-i han beon bulligo
daejiwa sandeul-i deulliuni geugeosdeul-i hanbeon-e sansanjogag-i nadeola
geuleohge geunal, pihal su eobsneun nal-i dagchyeowassnola
haneul-eun gallajyeoss-euni geugeos-eun geunal heuneulheuneulhadeola
cheonsadeul-eun geugeos(haneul)ui yeoleo kkeutjalag wie iss-eul geos-imyeo, geudeul(cheonsadeul) wie issneun yeodeolb(cheonsadeul)i geunal geudae junim-ui gwonjaleul tteobadchil geos-ila
geunal geudaedeul-eun deuleonage doel geos-ini geudaedeul-ui eotteohan naemilhan haeng-wido sumgyeojiji anh-eul geos-ila
gilogbuleul jasin-ui oleunjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “ibosio. geudaedeul-eun naui gilogbuleul ilg-eusio”
“sillo naneun naui gyesan gyeolgwaleul majdagtteulil geos-ila hwagsinhayeossso”
geulihayeo geuneun manjogseuleon salm-eul yeong-wihadeola
jigohan cheongug-eseola
geugos(cheongug)ui gwasil-eun deuliwojyeo issnola
geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, jinan nal geudaedeul-i haenghan il-e daehan daegala
gilogbuleul jasin-ui oenjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “naega naui gilogbuleul badji anh-assdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“naega naui gyesan gyeolgwaga mueos-inji mollassdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“geugeos(jug-eum)eulo da kkeutna beolyeossdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“nae jaesan-i na-ege botaem-i doeji moshaneunguna”
“nae gwonlyeogdo na-egeseo salajyeo beolyeossguna”
geudaedeul(cheonsadeul)eun geuleul jab-a pobaghala
geuleon hu taoleuneun bul(jiog)eulo geuleul bultaeula
geuleon hu gil-iga chilsib cheog-in saseul sog-eulo geuleul jib-eoneoh-eula
sillo ijeon-e geuneun gajang wieomhasin hananim-eul midji anh-assnola
geuneun ttohan bul-uhan jadeul-eul meog-ineun ildo gwon-yuhaji anh-assnola
geuleohgie oneul yeogiseo geuege hyeol-yug-eun eobs-eumyeo
goleum ioeeneun meog-eul geos-i eobsnola
geugeos-eul meogneun janeun ojig joejieun jadeul ppun-ila
geuleoni naneun geudaedeul-i boneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
geuligo geudaedeul-i boji moshaneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
jinsillo geugeos-eun myeong-yeloun sadoui mal-ini
geugeos-eun siin-ui mal-i anila. geudaedeul-i midneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
geugeos-eun jeomsulgaui maldo anila. geudaedeul-i gip-i saeng-gaghaneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
man-yuui junim-eulobuteo naelyeoon geos-ila
man-yag geu(muhammadeu)ga na-e gwanhae yeoleo maldeul jung-ui ilbuleul jieonaessdamyeon
naneun geuleul ganglyeoghi umkyeojab-ass-eul geos-ila
geuleon hu sillo naneun geulobuteo daedongmaeg-eul kkeunh-eo beolyeoss-eul geos-ila
geuleom-edo geudaedeul jung eotteon nugudo geubun-eul galomagji moshal geos-ila
sillo geugeos(kkulan)eun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
jinsillo naneun geudaedeul jung-e jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-i iss-eum-eul algo issnola
jinsillo geugeos(kkulan)eun bulsinjadeul-ui aetongham-ila
geuligo jinsillo geugeos(kkulan-eun) hwagsilhan jinlila
geuleoni geudaeneun gajang wieomhasin geudae junim-ui ileum-eul deunop-ila
yoguhaneun jaga dagchyeool beol-eul yoguhayeossdoda
(geu beol-eun) bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos-euloseo, geugeos(beol)eul jeojihal jonjaeneun eobsnola
(geu beol-eun) seungcheon-ui gil-eul soyuhasin hananim-eulobuteo (oneun geos-ila)
geunal cheonsadeulgwa yeonghon-i geubunkkelo ollagani geunal-ui gigan-eun omannyeon-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos(beol)eul meolge bojiman
naneun geugeos(beol)eul gakkabge bonola
geunal haneul-eun eong-gin gileumcheoleom doel geos-ila
geuligo sandeul-eun yangteolcheoleom doel geos-ila
ttohan hyeol-yug-eun (daleun) hyeol-yug-e daehae mudji anh-eul geos-ila

geudeul(hyeol-yug)i geudeul(daleun hyeol-yug)eul boge doem-edo (seoloui anbuleul mudji anh-eul geos-ila). aghaeng-eul jeojileun janeun geunal-ui jingbeol-eul beos-eonagi wihae jasin-ui jason-eul momgabs-eulo bachil suman issdamyeon hago galmanghadeola
jasin-ui baeujawa jasin-ui hyeongjewa
jasin-eul gamssajudeon gakkaun chincheoggwa
jigusang-e issneun moduleul bachyeoseolado geugeos(geudeul-ui momgabs)i geuleul guhae jugil (galmanghadeola)
geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(jiog)eun jag-yeolhaneun bulgil-ila
(jiog-eun) meoli kkeobjil-eul beosgyeo naemyeo
kkongmunileul ppaemyeo dol-aseossdeon jaleul buleul geos-ila
(jaesan-eul) mo-eugo ssah-a dudeon ja(leul buleul geos-ila)
